[databroker.ingestors]
application/x-npy = xicam.core.formats.NPYPlugin:ingest_npy

[databroker.intents]
BarIntent = xicam.core.intents:BarIntent
ErrorBarIntent = xicam.core.intents:ErrorBarIntent
ImageIntent = xicam.core.intents:ImageIntent
PairPlotIntent = xicam.core.intents:PairPlotIntent
PlotIntent = xicam.core.intents:PlotIntent
ScatterIntent = xicam.core.intents:ScatterIntent

[gui_scripts]
xicam = xicam.run_xicam:main

[xicam.plugins.CatalogPlugin]
databroker_catalog_plugin = xicam.gui.bluesky.databroker_catalog_plugin:DatabrokerCatalogPlugin

[xicam.plugins.DataHandlerPlugin]
npy = xicam.core.formats.NPYPlugin:NPYPlugin

[xicam.plugins.ImageMixinPlugin]
RowMajor = xicam.gui.widgets.imageviewmixins:RowMajor

[xicam.plugins.IntentCanvasPlugin]
image_canvas = xicam.gui.canvases:ImageIntentCanvas
pairplot_canvas = xicam.gui.canvases:PairPlotIntentCanvas
plot_canvas = xicam.gui.canvases:PlotIntentCanvas

[xicam.plugins.OperationPlugin]
absolute_square = xicam.core.operations:absolute_square
fourier_transform = xicam.core.operations:fourier_transform
inverse_fourier_transform = xicam.core.operations:inverse_fourier_transform
low_band_pass = xicam.core.operations:low_band_pass
raccoon_face = xicam.core.operations:raccoon_face
random_array = xicam.core.operations:random_array
tuple_test = xicam.core.operations:tuple_test

[xicam.plugins.PlotMixinPlugin]
ToggleSymbols = xicam.gui.widgets.plotwidgetmixins:ToggleSymbols

[xicam.plugins.PluginType]
CatalogPlugin = xicam.plugins.catalogplugin:CatalogPlugin
ControllerPlugin = xicam.plugins.controllerplugin:ControllerPlugin
DataHandlerPlugin = xicam.plugins.datahandlerplugin:DataHandlerPlugin
DataResourcePlugin = xicam.plugins.dataresourceplugin:DataResourcePlugin
EZPlugin = xicam.plugins.ezplugin:_EZPlugin
Fittable1DModelPlugin = xicam.plugins.fittablemodelplugin:Fittable1DModelPlugin
GUIPlugin = xicam.plugins.guiplugin:GUIPlugin
ImageMixinPlugin = xicam.plugins.imagemixinplugin:ImageMixinPlugin
IntentCanvasPlugin = xicam.plugins.intentcanvasplugin:IntentCanvasPlugin
OperationPlugin = xicam.plugins.operationplugin:OperationPlugin
PlotMixinPlugin = xicam.plugins.plotmixinplugin:PlotMixinPlugin
QWidgetPlugin = xicam.plugins.widgetplugin:QWidgetPlugin
SettingsPlugin = xicam.plugins.settingsplugin:SettingsPlugin
ingestors = xicam.plugins.ingestorplugin:IngestorPlugin
intents = xicam.plugins.intentplugin:IntentPlugin
sniffers = xicam.plugins.snifferplugin:SnifferPlugin

[xicam.plugins.SettingsPlugin]
appearance = xicam.gui.settings.appearance:AppearanceSettingsPlugin
cammart = xicam.gui.cammart:CamMartSettingsPlugin
connections = xicam.gui.connections:ConnectionSettingsPlugin
databroker = xicam.gui.settings.databroker:DatabrokerSettingsPlugin
execution = xicam.gui.settings.execution:ExecutionSettingsPlugin
logging = xicam.gui.settings.logging:LoggingSettingsPlugin
venvs = xicam.gui.cammart.venvs:VenvsSettingsPlugin
